events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be reaching out to coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening of your profile, and we are impressed with your background and technical skills relevant to this role.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions; this helps us tailor the upcoming interview accordingly.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 2 PM UTC; please prepare to discuss your coding experience.
You completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving and development skills.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 25th at 11 AM to discuss cultural fit and employment details.
You had a productive HR interview where we explored your long-term career goals and alignment with our company values.
We are excited to propose you an offer to join our engineering team; details have been sent to your email for review.
We received your positive feedback on the offer and are glad that the terms meet your expectations.
You officially accepted the offer to join our engineering team; welcome aboard, and we look forward to working with you.
Your onboarding process has begun, including setting up accounts, training schedules, and team introductions.
The hiring case is now closed successfully with your official start as a Software Engineer in our team.
